0111011010100101 1100101110000001 0 -> sum: 0100001000100110, cout: 1
1010011011010101 1101110010100010 1 -> sum: 1000001101111000, cout: 1
0010001011000010 1110000110110011 1 -> sum: 0000010001110110, cout: 1
